response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This item is truly exceptional and holds significant value for both its functionality and exclusivity. Given its worth to you, I propose an offer of $12,000 for this product. I believe this price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also acknowledges your appreciation for it. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 12000}
